channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury won’t cut threshold for higher rate income tax, say sources – UK politics live
item.description: Fallout continues over budget income tax U-turn, with Treasury saying expected fiscal gap has dropped to £20bn This is from Helen Miller , director of...

item.title: Rachel Reeves plans £7.5bn tax rise in budget after U-turn on income tax rates
item.description: Chancellor expected to freeze level at which people start paying income tax for two years rather than putting rates up Rachel Reeves will put a £7.5bn...

item.title: Trump again claims Epstein emails are a ‘hoax’ and dismisses furor, saying: ‘I have a country to run’ – US politics live
item.description: US president lambasts ‘weak Republicans’ asking for answers after email release and claims Democrats are using files to ‘deflect’ from ‘shutdown embar...

item.title: ‘Prolific’ sex offender Chao Xu jailed for life
item.description: Chinese national who police believe to be ‘one of the most prolific sex offenders of all time’ imprisoned for minimum of 14 years Chinese national Cha...

item.title: US markets struggle amid tech sell-off and economic uncertainty
item.description: Wall Street endured its worst day in a month on Thursday as fears that tech companies are now overvalued loom large Wall Street came under pressure on...

item.title: TikTok star HSTikkyTokky handed suspended sentence
item.description: Harrison Sullivan said he was "ashamed" after crashing his McLaren before failing to attend court.

item.title: Mass killings probe in Sudan will hold culprits to account, vows UN
item.description: "There has been too much pretence and performance, and too little action," says UN human rights chief Volker Türk.

item.title: Man jailed for drugging, raping and filming women
item.description: Multiple rapist Chao Xu is sentenced to life imprisonment with a minimum term of 14 years.

item.title: McIlroy continues charge for Race to Dubai title
item.description: Rory McIlroy chases Denmark's Nicolai Hoejgaard in the second round of the DP World Tour Championship for his seventh Race to Dubai title.

item.title: Several killed after bus crashes into Stockholm bus stop
item.description: Several others have have been injured in the crash in the Swedish capital, police say.
